tool_description: Configures optimal camera settings based on venue conditions, lighting scenarios, and photography styles for wedding events.

venue_type.description: Type of venue (indoor_church, outdoor_garden, ballroom, beach, etc.)

lighting_conditions.description: Expected lighting scenarios (natural_light, artificial_light, mixed_light, low_light, candlelight)

photography_styles.description: Required photography styles (portraits, candids, ceremony, reception, details)

camera_models.description: Camera models being used for the event

backup_mode.description: Whether to enable dual card slot backup recording

raw_format.description: Whether to shoot in RAW format

error_messages: Invalid venue type: Use recognized venue types like indoor_church, outdoor_garden, ballroom, beach.
Unknown lighting condition: Use valid lighting conditions like natural_light, artificial_light, mixed_light, low_light, candlelight.
Unrecognized photography style: Use valid styles like portraits, candids, ceremony, reception, details.
Invalid camera model: Ensure camera models exist in the compatibility database.
Invalid setting preference: Check that iso_preference, focus_mode, and metering_mode use valid options.
usage: Specify venue type, expected lighting conditions, photography styles, and camera models. Adjust optional settings for ISO, backup, format, focus, and metering preferences. The tool will generate optimized camera configurations.

camera_configs.description: Detailed camera settings for each model and scenario

scenario_specific_tips.description: Specific tips for each lighting and venue combination
